query:
SELECT id, nome, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = p.id) as clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = p.id) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = p.id) as leads
FROM projects p
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 5
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute SELECT id, nome,

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = p.id) as concorrentes,

LIMIT 5
